摘要： 必需 | 可选 详细信息： 元素

com.sinosoft.one.mvc.web.validation.annotation
注释类型 SizeEx

@Target(value=ANNOTATION_TYPE)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Documented
@Constraint(validatedBy={})
public @interface SizeEx

The annotated element size must be between the specified boundaries (included). Supported types are:

  • String (string length is evaludated)
  • Collection (collection size is evaluated)
  • Map (map size is evaluated)
  • Array (array length is evaluated)
    • null elements are considered valid.

    作者：
    Morgan

    必需元素摘要
     String[] props
               
     
    可选元素摘要
     int max
               
     String message
               
     int min
               
     

    元素详细信息

    props

    public abstract String[] props

    message

    public abstract String message
    默认值：
    "{javax.validation.constraints.Size.message}"

    min

    public abstract int min
    返回：
    size the element must be higher or equal to
    默认值：
    0

    max

    public abstract int max
    返回：
    size the element must be lower or equal to
    默认值：
    2147483647
